talents.name: illumination
talents.description: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a ${rankIncrement}% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.

talents.name: healing_light
talents.description: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: holy_power
talents.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: sanctified_light
talents.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy Light spell by ${rankIncrement}%.

talents.name: light-s_grace
talents.description: Gives your Holy Light spell a ${rankIncrement}% to reduce the cast time of your next Holy Light spell by 0.5 sec. This effect lasts 15 sec.
